dct_title_s: Map of the Peninsula of Mount Sinai and Arabia Petraea from the itineraries of E. Robinson and E. Smith
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. From: Robinson, Edward. Biblical researches in Palestine ... London, 1841, Maps volume. Inset maps: "Region between Cairo and Suez", "Pass of Akabah", "Plan of Petra from Laborde." Engraved on stone by H. Mahlmann.
dct_publisher_sm: London : Published as the act directs by John Murray, 50 Albemarle Str., April 1841.
